title: WTF!! Need to restart pc to open league after closed
body: I was playing league 1 day on the new patch alpha client when suddenly i decided to close league to go somewhere while i put my pc to sleep after i came back i started league and it wont work i started panicking if something wrong and i just restarted my pc after 5 mins (cause windows 10 restart takes to long) it worked i started to close it again to see if its broken after i closed it it wont open so i had to restart my pc again pls RITO fix this pls.{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like your system isn't correctly terminating the client/game process.

The next time this issue occurs, could you open up task manager (ctrl + shift + escape) and end any running league of legends processes, see if this issue persists.
